title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When attempting to import a project, no default folder is pre-selected, and users have to navigate through the file system to choose the import location.
EB: It would be nice if the Import Project feature could remember the last folder from which I imported a project. This would streamline the process and improve user experience.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the Import Project feature.
2. Observe that no default folder is pre-selected.
3. Choose a project to import and complete the import process.
4. Repeat the process and check if the Import Project feature now defaults to the last used folder.
